I do not have access to specific information about any particular company or industry. however, here are some examples of key technological advancements that have been introduced in various industries to enhance the quality of service:

1. online and mobile app booking and services: industries such as transportation, food delivery, and accommodation have introduced online and mobile app booking and service systems to provide easier and convenient access to their services.

2. automated customer service: many companies have introduced automated customer service systems that use natural language processing (nlp) technology to understand and respond to customer queries.

3. machine learning algorithms for personalized recommendations: e-commerce and entertainment platforms use machine learning algorithms to provide users with personalized product recommendations and content based on their browsing and purchase history.

4. augmented and virtual reality: retail and e-commerce businesses are experimenting with augmented and virtual reality technology to enhance the customer shopping experience and provide a more immersive experience.

5. iot technology for smart homes: home automation companies use iot technology to provide homeowners with more control over their homes through smart devices that can detect and respond to changes in the environment.
